message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Given its exceptional quality and features, it is valued at $8000 by us. Considering its unique value proposition, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive introductory price of $7200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you're interested. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier solution.
